revision.text: ==Galician== ===Noun=== {{head|gl|noun|g=m}} # {{lb|gl|chess}} [[check]] ====Related terms==== * {{l|gl|xaque mate}} ---- ==Old Spanish== ===Etymology=== From {{bor|osp|ar|-}}; see discussion in the modern descendant {{m|es|jaque}}. ===Noun=== {{head|osp|noun|g=m}} # {{lb|osp|chess}} [[check]] ====Descendants==== * {{desc|es|jaque}}
